alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 11:37PM CDT until May 30 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Holt County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... Boyd County in north central Nebraska... Northern Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1136 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Naper to near Atkinson to 8 miles southwest of Amelia, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Ewing, Butte, Chambers, Lynch, Page, Newport, Naper, Gross, Amelia, Inman, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka and Monowi. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 268 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 151 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 70 and 144. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Garfield; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock; Wheeler
